Articles.Content: I would like to have the ability to toggle, in the tracking center, between Earth time (which is what it currently displays) --24hrs in a day, 365 days in a year; and Kerbin time --6hrs in a day; 426 days per year. It might be helpful for, um, mission planning or something. Also, in map view, I'd like to be able to toggle between Mission Elapsed Time and Absolute Time.
Toggling MET and real time (in "earth-like" days and years) would be great, I wouldn't have to switch to tracking station when warping to a transfer window.
I'm happy without it, I like to think the kerbals consider 24 hours a day for some reason. As really, if day time was three hours long, nothing would ever get done.
